projects.title: ScenarioOps + Network Optimizer (Airflow + MinIO)
projects.tagline: Scenario-driven optimization runs treated as immutable, auditable data products (baseline once → scenarios → outputs).
highlights: Run structure: dt partition + run_id; each scenario has inputs/outputs under the same run.
Optimizer stays pure (dataclasses in/out). No Airflow/MinIO inside solvers.
Baseline shared across scenarios; knobs drive scenario deltas for clean comparison.

projects.title: Sensitivity Analysis for MILP (Optuna / SALib / SHAP)
projects.tagline: Rank drivers of objective/KPIs, then convert insights into scenario knobs for planning decisions.
highlights: Global sensitivity workflow for MILP using sampling + surrogate models.
Feature importance to identify cost/capacity drivers affecting KPIs.
Turns analysis into actionable scenarios (e.g., demand up triggers overtime).

projects.title: Production Network Configuration (MILP with Gurobi)
projects.tagline: Capability + capacity planning and investment decisions for production networks under constraints.
highlights: Structured sets/parameters → solve → export results and KPIs.
Focus on robust input checks and traceable outputs.
Designed to evolve into scenario comparison and dashboards.

projects.title: Discrete-Event Simulation of Production Flow (SimPy)
projects.tagline: Simulate a production process and compute WIP, utilization, bottlenecks, and capacity planning KPIs.
highlights: End-to-end model: arrivals, processing, queues, resources.
Used insights to guide improvement and planning.
